title: Did a ton of punishments just wear off or what?
body:
For a while(2-3 weeks) everything seemed to get magically better.  All the sudden I was only getting one or two trolls a day instead of one or two games without one.  People were being considerate and willing to try new things and forgive mistakes.  This remained consistent for so long I was completely convinced that Riot had done something amazing and the trolls were finally going away.  Then a couple days ago, all bets were off.  It turned right back into what it used to be, with me getting lucky to even get one troll free game in a day.  

So what happened?  Was it just that a wave of punishments ran it's course, or Is this just entirely random despite there being such a drastic change that it seemed like a miracle?

Edit: downvotes are hilarious on this, sweet example of the forum crowd.

replies.body: Maybe, but if you were in ranked, S5 just started, so you may be up with/against people obsessed with their placements.

I wasn't doing ranked much.  Surprisingly in the middle of all this raging I randomly braved ranked 3 times and each team was amazingly friendly and non-toxic. I was in Bizarro world! (the good kind)  :)
